title: Gold 1 Jungler/Top/Mid LFT
body:
I'm a gold 1 Jungler/Top/Mid looking for a  skilled team. I Have experience playing with, and shot calling for,  ranked teams previously from silver rated teams to gold teams. I am either looking to join a team or create a team with myself as the shot caller or until we decide someone is better suited for the role.

My strong point is decision making as I've managed to watch every lcs game since it began and even the majority of the tournaments prior to it's creation. I was gold 1 last season and managed to get to plat 5 in the start of the season but have now been demoted due to inactivity (have screen shot)

As I have been playing on and off since season 1 I have a very diverse champion pool but my strongest for each role is as follows

TOP:
{{champion:98}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:58}} {{champion:102}} {{champion:48}}  {{champion:150}} {{champion:36}} 
Strong split pusher and teleporter
Preferably tank champions

Jungle:
{{champion:107}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:59}}{{champion:102}} {{champion:20}} 
Probably my strongest role even though it may seem like then smallest champion pool. This is because I believe jungle is more about having one strong champion to fulfill each role. Whether that be early game pressure; pick comps or engage/peel. I feel as if this position best allows for my decisions making to come through
Very strong on Rengar


MID:
{{champion:238}} {{champion:101}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:81}}{{champion:4}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:30}} 
Roaming assassins with xerath being my go to team fight champion followed
Zed is undoubtedly my strongest mid laner and possibly my strongest champion over all.


I currently am a bit out of form as I haven't played try hard in around 10 weeks but feel as if I can pick it up again quickly.

If anyone is interested in more info add my IGN and feel free to ask :)


EDIT: My friend who is very strong in communication with me is also looking for a team
He is an ADC main and jungle is his fall back position

EDIT 2: Best off looking at my last seasons stats as I haven't played seriously at all this season :)

EDIT 3: Started playing solo que again and am back in plat

replies.body: Awesome, maybe we can look into building a team :)
Sorry guys, looking for at least high gold

Ay man, I'm looking to join a ranked team, I'm currently in Bronze 3 and want to climb but with a team that isn't salty or toxic. If ya don't mind playing with a less experienced player but a quick learner, I can fill any role needed but I pref jg/top. IGN: CastielZaim11

S2 Mid Main i am looking for a ranked team if you thinking of starting one add me on either league or curse.

IGN: Kitty Katt
Curse: CrabLord
